STATUS = 2) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(l.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_add(curdate(), interval - day(curdate()) + 1 day) and DATE_FORMAT(l.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) and l.type = 5 ) l2 on l1.loan_collection_order_id = l2.loan_collection_order_id ) l3 group by l3.current_collection_user_id,DATE_FORMAT(l3.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ) ) s left join mman_loan_collection_company c on s.company_id = c.id left join back_user usr on usr.uuid = s.current_collection_user_id left join sys_dict dct on usr.group_level = dct.`value` and dct.type = 'collection_group' left join sys_dict dct1 on s.current_collection_order_level = dct1.`value` and dct1.type = 'xjx_overdue_level' group by s.current_collection_user_id, s.count_date

select DATE_FORMAT(#{currDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, tt.current_collection_user_id as person_id, tt.user_name as person_name, tt.title as company_title, tt.comId as company_id, tt.label as group_name, tt.current_overdue_level as group_id, sum(tt.undoneNum) as undone_order_num, sum(tt.doneNum) as done_order_num, if(sum(tt.undoneNum) = 0,'0' ,round(sum(tt.doneNum)/sum(tt.undoneNum)*100 ,2)) as order_rate from ( ( select t.current_collection_user_id, t.user_name, t.title, t.comId, t.label, t.current_overdue_level, sum(t.undoneNum) as undoneNum, 0 as doneNum from ( ( select o.id, o.current_collection_user_id, b.user_name, m.title, m.id as comId, dct.label, o.current_overdue_level, count(o.current_collection_user_id) as undoneNum from mman_loan_collection_order o left join back_user b on b.uuid = o.current_collection_user_id left join mman_loan_collection_company m on m.id = b.company_id left join sys_dict dct on o.current_overdue_level = dct.`value` and dct.type = 'collection_group' where DATE_FORMAT(o.dispatch_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{currDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and b.role_id = 10021 and o.`status` != 4 group by o.current_collection_user_id ) UNION ALL ( select o.id, o.current_collection_user_id, b.user_name, m.title, m.id as comId, dct.label, o.current_overdue_level, count(o.current_collection_user_id) as undoneNum from mman_loan_collection_order o left join back_user b on b.uuid = o.current_collection_user_id left join mman_loan_collection_company m on m.id = b.company_id left join sys_dict dct on o.current_overdue_level = dct.`value` and dct.type = 'collection_group' where b.role_id = 10021 and o.`status` = 4 and DATE_FORMAT(o.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{currDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by o.current_collection_user_id ) ) t group by t.current_collection_user_id ) UNION ALL ( select r.collection_id, b.user_name, m.title, m.id as comId, dct.label, o.current_overdue_level, 0 as undoneNum, count(DISTINCT r.order_id) as doneNum from mman_loan_collection_record r inner join back_user b on b.uuid = r.collection_id inner join mman_loan_collection_company m on m.id = b.company_id left join mman_loan_collection_order o on o.id = r.order_id left join sys_dict dct on o.current_overdue_level = dct.`value` and dct.type = 'collection_group' where b.role_id = 10021 and DATE_FORMAT(r.collection_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{currDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by r.collection_id ,DATE_FORMAT(r.collection_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ) )tt group by tt.current_collection_user_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM count_collection_manage WHERE DATE_FORMAT(count_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(count_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d');
